pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: B1551, New York (State). Bureau of Social Studies. "The Price of Liberty" sound recordings, [ca. 1950]
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: A collaborative project between the NYS Education Department and the Albany Junior League to develop historical segments for radio broadcast
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Note: The Museum of Innovation and Science (formerly the Schenectady Museum) has already uploaded these to YouTube, for example, here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WGTEHmUSgq4
